segments.text: I can't even imagine you snorkeling !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you'll see . With this new watch , I can go anywhere , do anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , really . Look . It's got a double time zone setting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you can always keep two times at once ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yep . I just can't decide what two cities to choose ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The only two times you need are I'm late and I'm really late .
segments.speaker: S1
